entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
